description.narrative: Legislation harmonized with EU/UN stand., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection â€“ General, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education, Health Systems Strengthening, Justice For Children, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By the end of 2016, Montenegro's legal and policy framework is harmonized with EU/UN standards, and policies related to child focused governance and social inclusion of children are implemented and monitored

description.narrative: Family Law of Montenegro harmonised with respective international instruments and standards and first ever National Strategy on Protection of Children from Violence were developed in 2016 contributing to a strengthened inter-sectoral cooperation in the area of fight against violence. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:28/12/2016

title.narrative: Existence of legislation that recognize children's right to be heard in civil and administrative proceedings that affect them (in line with Article 12 of the CRC)
